bwwExcerpt: Schreiber misses badly here, offering up a kind of Ray Donovan take on Valmont, brutish and creepy. He's less a bodice-ripping villain than the kind of guy who in modern times would be hanging around school playgrounds wearing a trench coat....
wrongShowReason: Cross-show URL collision (revival, no signal): defaulting to most recent production les-liaisons-dangereuses-2016
